caption.p: Cytotoxicity (no UV; under dark conditions) and photocytotoxicity (UV; under high ultraviolet A radiation) against the murine fibroblasts following the treatment with the leaf, shoot and the root extracts of ( a, b) the Clermont and ( c, d) the Toogoolawah biotypes of parthenium weed. Error bars represent Â± one standard error.
